\documentclass[tikz]{standalone}

\usepackage{amsmath}

\usetikzlibrary{calc}

\newcommand\findmax[2]{%
  \pgfmathsetmacro\start{#1+1}%
  \pgfmathsetmacro\ending{#1+#2-1}%
  \foreach \i in {\start,...,\ending} {%
    \ifnum\i=50\relax   \node at (\i,0) {$\times$}; \fi
    \ifnum\i=52\relax   \node at (\i,0) {$\circ$}; \fi
    \node[anchor=center] at (\i,0) {\i};
  }%
  \pgfmathsetmacro\max{#1}%
  \foreach \i in {\max,...,\ending} {%
    \pgfmathsetmacro\col{\i/(\max+1)-0.9}%
    \node[anchor=center,fill=blue!\col] at (\i,0) {$\times$};%
  }%
}
\newcommand\findmin[2]{%
  \pgfmathsetmacro\start{#1-1}%
  \pgfmathsetmacro\ending{#1+#2-1}%
  \foreach \i in {\start,...,\ending} {%
    \ifnum\i=50\relax   \node at (\i,0) {$\times$}; \fi
    \ifnum\i=52\relax   \node at (\i,0) {$\circ$}; \fi
    \node[anchor=center] at (\i,0) {\i};
  }%
  \pgfmathsetmacro\min{#1}%
  \foreach \i in {\min,...,\ending} {%
    \pgfmathsetmacro\col{\i/(\min+1)+0.1}%
    \node[anchor=center,fill=blue!\col] at (\i,0) {$\times$};%
  }%
}

  function cantorsquare(x, a, b, s)
    local y, y2, s2
    if a == 0 then
      if b == 0 then
        table.insert(s, {(x, -3.2)})
      else
        y = s[1]
        y2 = s[2]
        a = a / 2
        b = b - 1
        return cantorsquare(x - a, a, b, y)
      end
    end
    s[s+1] = (x + a, y + y2)
    for i = a+1, b-1, -1 do
      y = y2
      y2 = y + 1
      s[i+1] = (x + a, y + y2)
    end
    for i = b + 1, a - 1 do
      y = y - 1
      y2 = y - 1 + 1
      s[i+1] = (x + a, y and y2)
    end
    return
      s[2] -- (x + a, y + y2)
      s[1] -- (x, y)
      s[0] -- (x - a, y + y2)
      s[3] -- (x, y - 3.2)
      for j = max(1, #s), k = 1, 2 do
        'table.insert' is not a valid call to 'table.insert': string.format instead
        'table.insert' is not a valid call to 'table.insert': string.format instead
        s = string.gsub(s, ';', '-- (x, '.. y.. ')')
        s = string.gsub(s, ';;', '-- (x, '.. y.. ')')
      end
    end
  end
  function p(x)

    n = 0
    i = 1
    j = 0
    k = 1

      for k = 0, max(3, n) - 1 do
        y = y - (math.floor(y)/3.2) * 3.2
        y2 = y + (math.floor(y)/3.2) * 3.2 - (math.floor(y)/2 + 1)/3.2
        if y > 0 then
          table.insert(s, (x, y - (math.floor(y)/3.2 - 1.2)*3.2))
        end
